pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, December 31, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, December 31, 2016:

Personal.

Media Appearances

10:00 p.m. ET – Interview with Jean-René Dufort for Radio-Canada’s “Infoman 2016”

11:00 p.m. ET – Interview with Rick Mercer for CBC’s “Canada’s New Year’s Eve Countdown”
